name: Cyber Troopers Virtual-On: Oratorio Tangram
overview: Cyber Troopers Virtual-On: Oratorio Tangram is the first of three major revisions to Cyber Troopers Virtual-On: Oratorio Tangram, a sequel to Cyber Troopers Virtual-On. M.S.B.S. Ver. 5.2 was released for Sega Model 3 arcade hardware and is thought to have been exlusive to Japan.
